column4: hey for some reason my gdm.conf is gone, and i cant restore it with dpkg-reconfigure gdm. How do i get my default gdm.conf back?
i tried apt-get remove gdm, and then apt-get install gdm. didnt really make any difference :|
I don't know if your question got answered, but maybe you need to purge the package.  The gdm.conf is in that package
